entry.title: Choice is Yours - Custom Cologne or Body Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Topher's Beard + Soap Co.
Type: cologne
Price: 18.00

Customize your Cologne or Body Spray.

Sometimes you want a scent that we don't stock or just want to do your own things and have a scent that is all your own. Here is your chance to customize a Body Spray just for you. Our Body Spray or Cologne is blended with your choice of up to 3 scents listed below. ​ Now you can rock a scent that is truly your own.

Target your body and neck with a few sprays for long lasting fragrance that makes a lasting impression all day long.

Test on skin before use, may contain allergens.​

​Ingredients: Ingredients: Aqua, Hamamelis Virginiana Distillate (Witch Hazel), Fragrance, Polysorbate 80, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol (and) Diazolidinyl Urea (and) Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate (Germall Plus Preservative).

How to use: Shake well before each use. apply to pulse points, skin and hair, avoiding eyes and mouth. patch test clothing and fabrics.
Caution: EXTERNAL USE ONLY

Fragrance Oils - High Quality, Paraben and Phthalate Free.

  • Absinthe (Wormwood)
  • Acai Berry

entry.title: Gift Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Topher's Beard + Soap Co.
Type: Gift Card
Price: 10.00 - 100.00 (4 variants)

Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a Topher's Beard + Soap Co. gift card.

Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.

entry.title: Caribbean Crush Body Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Topher's Beard + Soap Co.
Type: cologne
Price: 15.00

A tropical blend of fragrant banana, sweet coconut with hints of smooth vanilla + chocolate.  Our top selling ladies scent in a body spray.

We've taken our best selling ladies fragrances and turned them into a body spray.  Target your body and neck with a few sprays for long lasting fragrance that makes a lasting impression all day long.

entry.title: Pretty Body Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Topher's Beard + Soap Co.
Type: cologne
Price: 15.00

White Woods, Pink Flowers and Vanilla make the perfect soft, feminine scent that you just can't do without in a body spray.

We've taken our best selling ladies fragrances and turned them into a body spray.  Target your body and neck with a few sprays for long lasting fragrance that makes a lasting impression all day long.

We've taken our best selling ladies fragrances and turned them into a body spray.  Target your body and neck with a few sprays for long lasting fragrance that makes a lasting impression all day long.

entry.title: Summer Bliss Body Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Topher's Beard + Soap Co.
Type: cologne
Price: 15.00

Strawberries season here in Ontario marks the start of summer so as tribute we blended Champagne + Fresh Strawberries for this fruity scented body spray

We've taken our best selling ladies fragrances and turned them into a body spray.  Target your body and neck with a few sprays for long lasting fragrance that makes a lasting impression all day long.

entry.title: Rugged Cologne Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Topher's Beard + Soap Co.
Type: cologne
Price: 15.00

We blended chocolate, tobacco, patchouli, lime with light musk and vanilla.  While this sounds like a crazy mix, we have had nothing but glowing reviews from those that have smelt it.

We've taken our best selling mens fragrances and turned them into a body spray.  Target your body and neck with a few sprays for long lasting fragrance that makes a lasting impression all day long.

entry.title: Havana Humidor Cologne Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Topher's Beard + Soap Co.
Type: cologne
Price: 15.00

Do you love walking into a cigar shop?  Not your run of the mill shop, but that high end one, with the walk in humidor in the back, full of wooden boxes of high end imported cigars?  If so, then this is the scent for you.

We've taken our best selling mens fragrances and turned them into a body spray.  Target your body and neck with a few sprays for long lasting fragrance that makes a lasting impression all day long.

entry.title: Drunken Pirate Cologne Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Topher's Beard + Soap Co.
Type: cologne
Price: 15.00

Our fresh, clove free Bay Rum scent is reminiscent of barber shops of old and is truly masculine. Bay Laurel, Patchouli and Mixed Citrus, need I say more. Independent studies have shown that women in your life will stay closer just to take in more of this scent. 

We've taken our best selling mens fragrances and turned them into a body spray.  Target your body and neck with a few sprays for long lasting fragrance that makes a lasting impression all day long.

entry.title: Whiskey Woodsmoke Cologne Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Topher's Beard + Soap Co.
Type: cologne
Price: 15.00

Distinctly masculine, our blend of Citrus Zest, velvety smooth Whiskey, Cuban cigars and classic White Woods come together to roar out it's manliness.  This scent screams success and prestige.

We've taken our best selling mens scent and turned it into a body spray.  Target your body and neck with a few sprays for long lasting fragrance that makes a lasting impression all day long.
